Resist Buffer





Mental Shield Lv 4
Increases resist to hold/sleep
Resist Shock Lv 4
Increases resistance to stun by 20
Chant of Protection Lv 1
Decreases critical dmg received
Counter Critical Lv 1
Increases P. Def. against criticals
Eye of Pa'agrio Lv 1
Increases accuracy by 4
Elemental Protection Lv 1
Resist to fire/water/wind/earth
Divine Protection Lv 1
Increases resistance to divine by 30
Arcane Protection Lv 1
Increases resist to cancel by 30
Invigor Lv 3
Increases resistance to bleed by 50%
Regeneration Lv 3
Increases HP Regeneration by 20%
Resist Poison Lv 3
Increases resist to poison by 50%
Resist Fire Lv 3
Increases resistance to fire by 20
Resist Aqua Lv 3
Increases resistance to water by 20
Resist Wind Lv 3
Increases resistance to wind by 20
Earth Resistance Lv 3
Increases resistance to earth by 30
Holy Resistance Lv 3
Increases resistance to divine by 30
Unholy Resistance Lv 3
Increases resistance to dark by 30
